column6:
Bruce Banner heads to the Baxter Building hoping that Mr. Fantastic can help rid him of his curse. But Ben Grimm's the only one home and he knows H-U-L-K spells "trouble." It's the green goliath vs. the ever-lovin', blue-eyed Thing! 'Nuff said!,2008,5
All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Paul Benjamin | inker:Nathan Massengill | artist:Steve Scott | letterer:Dave Sharpe | colorist:Chris Sotomayor
